page.title: 13Home life
page.content: Family ties are very strong, and when children grow up they often remain in the area near to the parental home. Farmers and their families still tend to eat the main meal in the middle of the day, with a high tea or supper in the evening. Commuters largely have their main meal at night after returning from work. The standard of food is very high, with emphasis on home produce, milk and eggs. As most farmers wifes have to cater for heavy workers, the meals are very substantial and nourishing. Pride is taken in cooking skills. Living standards are high, and most farmhouses and private houses are well and tastefully furnished. Usually the decor is in keeping with the type of house occupied.
